attributes.action: found the mighty Northern megopolis of Leddchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new city of Leddchester - Leeds, Huddersfield, Manchester - with Anthony H Wilson as mayor.

This city will have a population of 5 million, and act as a counterweight to London.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
